mapper.insert: insert into tbl_qna_reply (qna_code, qna_reply_code, qna_reply) values (#{qna_code}, seq_qna_reply_code.nextval, #{qna_reply})
mapper.update: update tbl_qna_reply set qna_reply = #{qna_reply}, qna_replydate = sysdate where qna_reply_code = #{qna_reply_code}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_qna_reply where qna_code = #{qna_code} order by qna_reply_code asc
